posts.title: Another day, another update...
posts.excerpt: We've got some more features, such as a pause and play button, a volume slider, and a Track Info Display. I wanted to add more features but I'm pretty tired, haha. We'll see what tomorrow brings!

posts.title: Felix Involvement!
posts.excerpt: Encountered a bunch of issues, but Felix helped me a TON. Lots of code cleanup since I'm code-illiterate xd

posts.title: Welcome to the new Bubbledtune Radio!
posts.excerpt: The Bubbledtune Radio has been revamped with a new look. It's been a while since I touched the website, but we're so back!
